alert.note: Alert for Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 10:16AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Windham, northeastern Tolland, southwestern Worcester, southeastern Hampshire, southeastern Franklin and southeastern Hampden Counties through 1115 AM EDT... At 1015 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Chicopee, Massachusetts to near Mansfield, Connecticut. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Chicopee, Holyoke, Amherst, Mansfield, Ludlow, South Hadley, Southbridge, Auburn, East Longmeadow, Ellington, Tolland, Belchertown, Wilbraham, Oxford, Millbury, Charlton, Palmer, Stafford and Spencer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.
